mapper.select: SELECT id, name, path, type, parentId, sequence FROM resources WHERE isDeleted = 0 AND parentId = #{id} ORDER BY sequence
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO resources (name, path, type, parentId, sequence, createdBy, createdOn, modifiedBy, modifiedOn, isDeleted) VALUES (#{name},#{path},#{type},#{parentId},#{sequence},#{createdBy},now(),#{createdBy},now(),0)
mapper.update: UPDATE resources SET name = #{name}, path = #{path}, type = #{type}, sequence = #{sequence}, modifiedBy = #{modifiedBy}, modifiedOn = now() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE resources SET isDeleted = 1 WHERE id = #{id}
